contents:
analytics_admin:
    # If set this to off, we won't process any page views.
    analytics_on: true
    # The database from GeoIP to be used to get location information.
    geoip_database_path: '/usr/share/GeoIP/GeoLite2-City.mmdb'

when@test:
    analytics_admin:
        analytics_on: false

when@dev:
    analytics_admin:
        # set this to true to fake IPs when seeing the website from localhost
        analytics_dev_mode: true
